ID_SET_USER_ID.description: The menu item where the user changes the session id

ID_SET_USER_ID_TEXT.message: Unique ID used to connect to the devices, it's like a password.

ID_SET_USER_ID_NO_UUID.message: The session ID must be a valid UUID.
